sentences.en: A very virulent form of the disease appeared in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 比利时出现了这种疾病的一种极其危险的变体。

sentences.en: Belgium and Luxembourg have formed such a union since 1921.
sentences.cn: 比利时和卢森堡从1921年以来就组成了这种同盟.
比利时有两种官方语言.

sentences.en: Europe's largest producer of nylon is based in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 欧洲最大的尼龙制造商总部设在比利时。

sentences.en: He moved to Belgium in 1990 to live with his son, who had been resident in Brussels since 1967.
sentences.cn: 他于1990年搬到比利时和儿子一起住。他儿子自1967年起就住在布鲁塞尔。

sentences.en: He was saving his energy for next week's race in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 他正为下周在比利时的比赛养精蓄锐。

sentences.en: I remember watching one of my tapes from 1991 when I went to Belgium and looked at myself speaking English.
sentences.cn: 我记得我看过一盘我1991年的录像带，那时我刚到比利时，我看着我自己说英语的样子。

sentences.en: In Belgium only qualified doctors may practise alternative medicine.
sentences.cn: 在比利时只有资质合格的医生才能从事非传统医学工作。

sentences.en: Ostend is the most important seaport in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 奥斯坦德是比利时最重要的海港.

sentences.en: She is a frequent traveller to Belgium.
sentences.cn: 她经常到比利时去旅行。

sentences.en: Someone once said: ‘beauty is in the eye of the beer holder’; if that’s the case, then Belgium is exquisite.
sentences.cn: 有人曾经说过：“在手持啤酒的人眼中美丽无处不在。” 如果真的是这样，那么比利时就美艳至极了。

sentences.en: That is greater than the GDP of Belgium and Sweden.
sentences.cn: 这超过了比利时和瑞典两国的国民收入。

sentences.en: The company has set up joint-venture pay-TV channels in Belgium, Spain, and Germany.
sentences.cn: 该公司已在比利时、西班牙和德国设立了合资付费电视频道。

sentences.en: The rise, the first in 10 months, reversed the downward trend in Belgium's jobless rate.
sentences.cn: 10个月来失业率的首次上升逆转了比利时失业率持续下降的趋势。

sentences.en: The site of the battle of Waterloo is in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 滑铁卢战场的遗址在比利时.

sentences.en: The win sets us up perfectly for the match in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 这场胜利为我们在比利时的比赛鼓足了劲儿。

sentences.en: They arrived in Belgium by airplane .
sentences.cn: 他们乘飞机到达比利时。

sentences.en: We ought to have entered the war the minute Germany invaded Belgium.
sentences.cn: 只要德国侵略比利时,我们就应该参战.
